DEMO_042_MSG_010:
́Yo! I've been waitin' fer ya, kid! It's nice to meet ya!
The name's Ace... and don'tcha forget it! 
ā
DEMO_042_MSG_020:
́So, I hear yer gonna head on over to Glutton's Keep an' save our friends, ain't that right?
ā
DEMO_042_MSG_030:
́In that case, I'm goin' to link our Reactors together so we can call each other up, ya see.
ā
DEMO_042_MSG_040:
́I'll be able to give ya full support without even leavin'
the freakin' village!
DEMO_042_MSG_050:
́You should be able to hear me now through the Reactor.
Heck, we can even have a live video chat!
DEMO_042_MSG_060:
́Alright-alright-alright! ... Cool, ain't it?! Looks like all 
systems are a-go! ... As expected!
DEMO_042_MSG_070:
́Speakin' o' which, yer stealth box sensor was a bit banged up. So... I went ahead an fixed 'er right up!
ā
DEMO_042_MSG_080: ́Now, if you get near an invisible stealth box, yer Reactor's gonna detect it and let ya know.
DEMO_042_MSG_090: ́Alright-alright, now go 'an see Jack. He's been waitin' fer ya by the front of the Park.
